Livingdatalab is the AI Technical Blog of Pranath Fernando, an AI Consultant, AI Strategist & Data Scientist with a special interest in NLP, Large Language Models (LLM's) and its applications.

I also publish a newsletter [The FuturAI](https://medium.com/@pranathfernando) about Artificial Intelligence and its impact on people, society and businesses.
